findings.title: Id Mismatch between MyTvStaking#stakingFlexKeys and MyTvStaking#stakingFlex
findings.description: The id information of MyTvStaking#stakingFlexKeys may mismatch with the id information of MyTvStaking#stakingFlex.

findings.title: Unintended Update of penaltyBalance Value
findings.description: In the MyTvStaking#unstakeLock() function, MyTvStaking#penaltyBalance value may be updated as unintended due to incorrect logic when a user unstakes or claims earlier than the period of the stacking pack.

findings.title: StakingPack already in progress can call the MyTvStaking#deleteStakingPack() function.
findings.description: When a user has already participated in a StakingPack, calling the deleteStakingPack() function may cause an issue when trying to access the non-existent element of the stakingOptions array in the unstakeLock() function.

findings.title: The reward value of StakingFlex is not 0 in the MyTvStaking#stakeFor() function.
findings.description: The reward value enters MyTvStaking#stakedFlex as a significant value when calling the MyTvStaking#stakeFor() function, unlike staking in the flexible stacking pack with the MyTvStaking#stake() function, which can cause unintended behavior in the MyTvStaking#increaseStakeFlex() function and other places.

findings.title: Unupdated currentUser Information
findings.description: When a user unstakes all staked amount in the flexible staking pack using MyTvStaking#unstakeFlex(), the function removes the user’s address from the MyTvStaking#stakedFlexKeys array but does not update the currentUser of the corresponding stake pack.

findings.title: There are missing events.
findings.description: The functions transferToReserveAndBurn lacks the TransferReserve event, making it difficult to identify accurate values recorded on the blockchain in real-time.
